active_incidents.title: Issues with the billing history page

notes.body:
We have identified the cause of the problem and we're preparing a fix. 

We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as the fix goes live, whichever comes first.

Customers may be unable to access their billing history at the moment. We are working to resolve this and will be back with an update in 30 minutes or as soon as we have news to share. 

If you need urgent access to your billing history, please contact us at feedback@slack.com. 

Thank you for bearing with us.
